modName: The Ashen Beauty - Valkyria Dragonborne -Tifa like char
summary: Someone PM me and want my saved character. Since it\'s easier to upload it in nexusmod, why I should upload to another sites? Note: IMO, Sometimes... girls need to cut the hair especially when her love is rejected.. hehehe
descriptionHtml:
Companion mod available for download here:http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=14281 

[center]You may say why I uploading \"crap\" like this.. But I dont think this is crap [IMO it\'s good and it\'s just that we have different taste]. The proof is.... someone PM me and want my saved character. Since it\'s easier to upload it in nexusmod, why I should upload to another sites?[/center]

BTW, Feel free to give comments. I like to read your comments lol/

She\'s start at Lv 3 and happened stopped at Warmaiden in Whiterun. 
[center][img]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/imageshare/images/183089-1331796836.jpg[/img][/center]
Requirement:
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE - Xenius Character Enhancement[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE - Xenius detailed Lips[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2356]XCE -No more Blocky face[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=8583]Ashen - oriental beauty race[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6953]Oriental beauty Women and Man mod[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=627]Eyebrows Match Hair - closer match v 1_1[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

Optional
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11954]Pretty Idle female by dualsun[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12525]Depth of field enchancer mod Dynavision[/url]
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12673]Tifa Clothes[/url]

INSTALLATION
=============
- extract it to your document [My Document where your saved game placed]
- What inside the files? \"My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves\\Save 38 - Valkyria Dragonborne  Warmaiden\'s  03.40.51.ess\"

[color=orange]Note : I re-scale my character to 1.05-1.1 since Ashen race is smaller[/color]
author: xp32
